alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 7:41PM CST until March 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo, Sumter and Hale Counties. .Flooding is subsiding on the Tombigbee River at the Demopolis Lock and Dam. A flood warning remains in effect until tomorrow afternoon. Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 68.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CST Wednesday was 69.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 52.3 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 68 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
